profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

Thanks for visiting us at HomeStars. At Premiere Custom Millwork & Fireplaces Ltd, our philosophy is simple; to be the best we can be in servicing your needs. We believe that our customers come first; it is not just a cliché but a commitment we make to all our past and future customers. 

To be successful in business, it takes a winning combination of services, competitive pricing and dedication by all employees to excel at customer service excellence. Our continued growth is testament to our pledge to provide you with products of the highest quality and unmatched customer service; we have built our reputation on this belief. 

We encourage you to look around our site and see what we have to offer. If you don’t see what you are looking for, call us at 905-671-3473 and we will be happy to discuss your needs.

profile:
We are Ontario’s premier home renovation company. Our experts are passionate about building you the home of your dreams. With over 12 years of industry experience in basement renovations, bathroom renovations, and home-building solutions, we have satisfied hundreds of homeowners. And we’d love to do the same for you for your home renovation.

For all your home renovation needs–whether a bathroom makeover or a basement renovation or Kitchen remodelling, whatever your intentions – we have the know-how to see the job through to success. 

Our team brings the ideas, creativity, and know-how that will make a real difference in your home renovation project, saving you money and finding the perfect combination of style and function.

Founded on basic tenets like fairness and trust, Domilya Group works with you to transform renovation ideas into top-quality results that will leave you with the space you have envisioned. 

Home renovation projects can be stressful, but we take the extra steps to make it hassle-free for you. This becomes possible because of our unique approach, which we feel sets us apart.


Need something installed?  We install it all. All work is done right the first time because we take great pride in our work. 


Redo Your Home Right:

If you need a bathroom, basement, a kitchen or whole home renovations, we provide the materials and know-how.

We know what it takes to protect your home and make it look beautiful. We guarantee all of our work. 


We provide top-notch construction at competitive pricing.

Most of our services are provided to homeowners who want to modernize their residences, such as updating or enlarging an existing kitchen or bathroom, finishing a basement or a complete gut job. We specialize in helping prepare homes for sale and being on time and on budget.   


Home Improvement time is here!
Fast, Friendly, Professional Service with Quality Workmanship. 
Our team will work hard for you to make your renovation dream come true.


We offer:

*Preparing Homes for Sale
*Finishing Basements
*Bathroom & Kitchen Renovations
*Flooring–(Laminate, Hardwood, Carpet and Ceramic, Marble)
*Framing & Taping
*Painting
*Home Remodeling
*Home Renovations
*Electrical & Plumbing (subcontracted to licensed trades-persons)
And much more!


We are geared to delivering specialized home remodeling services to clientele in the Greater Toronto Area, Halton, and Peel Region. Our quality approach and efforts ensure that your renovating project is designed and completed just the way you imagined it.


Let us refurbish your home from top to bottom. 

Here are some examples of the work we do- 
Doors,  Windows, Painting, Backsplash, Kitchen Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Interior Work, Finishing Basements, Tiles, Faucets & Sinks, Custom Design, Extensions, Drywall, Shower Doors, Drywall Framing, Closet Doors, Shower Enclosures,  Crown Mouldings, General Carpentry, Flooring, Interior Finishing, Floor Leveling, Hardwood, Laminate, Small Renovations, Bathroom Remodeling, Kitchen  Remodeling, Cabinet Installations, Interior Painting, Bathroom Vanities, Laminate Installation, Hardwood Installation, Tub Enclosures, Ceramic, Wall Plastering, Ceiling Painting & Repair, Finishing Basements, Changing Stairs.

profile:
Kitchen and Bath is the trusted home renovations contractor throughout Toronto, Etobicoke and Mississauga and surrounding areas. Like our name suggests, we are kitchen and bathroom specialists but also perform other types of home renovations such as custom cabinetry for entertainment units and closets.


Why choose us?
If you are a homeowner in the Toronto or Mississauga area and are considering a home renovation for your bathroom or kitchen, then Kitchen and Bath is your best choice. We provide a full range of services to take you through the remodelling process from design to completed project. Call us today to schedule your free, in-home consultation.

profile:
At Adore Your Kitchen, we believe that the kitchen is the most important room the house and the heart of a home.  Our company was founded on the principle that every family should have the opportunity to make the kitchen an attractive showcase for their pride in their home and affection for their family.

The advantages of Refacing your kitchen with our company include:
•Everything handled from the comfort of your home
•Customization at every step in the process
•Complete Installation in 2 – 3 days versus 4 – 6 weeks
•Affordable approach to remodeling your kitchen
•No plumbing or electrical work
•Minimal mess, no major renovation (eco-friendly)
•A wide range of colours, styles and hardware

During our 11 years in business, we’ve worked with hundreds of families in different communities who wanted to feel comfortable with the design resource/collaborator/partner invited into their home and trusted with their kitchen remodel investment.  Our customers’ own words are the best endorsement of our commitment to our clients’ satisfaction.  

We guarantee every one of our projects will use quality materials and will be delivered on time and within budget.  We proudly support our professional installations with a warranty on materials and labour.

_________________________________________________
 
Green Maple Home Renovations is focused on providing high –quality service and customer satisfaction.  It’s success comes from hard work, honesty and a feedback between contractor and customer on all stages of each project. 
 Renovating a house could be a stressful experience.  So, why renovating?
Because we make it easy for you and because just a kitchen, bathroom or a basement renovation will increase the value of your home for future sale or simply  to make your home more comfortable to live in now.
Our team will guide you through this process to make it a smooth and memorable renovation experience. 
 From frame to finish, we do it all . No matter how big or small your renovation project is, we're the company for the job. We are proud of our countless satisfied customers. Choose us for any renovation project, and you'll be glad you did.
 We would welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and help you to transform your living space delivering superior construction and design.
 
Why Green Maple? 
 
We are specialists in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basements Renovations.
 
We start with a consultation to map out your vision, requirements and budget for the projects. From there, we will develop a plan of action for the project and discuss a time frame.
 
Because we want you to feel involved throughout the entire project, you are welcome to get in touch with us at any time.
 
We will explain you what’s going on as the project takes shape, and discuss problems reasonably and will work with you to make the result as good as it can be.
 
We have the technical, business and interpersonal skills, the tools and the experience needed to do the job you want done. 
 
We have experience with projects similar to yours and we know what materials and techniques are needed for your work; and even better, about problems with similar work and how to solve them.
 
We are willing and able to help you refine your plans where possible, resulting in a more desirable and cost-effective project. 
 
We are knowledgeable about the type of work you’re doing and able to suggest ways to get what you want and meet your budget.
 
Before starting the job we will give you a fixed price which includes all the materials, labor, equipment and fees and will put everything in a signed contract.
 
From the initial consultation to the last service, we keep you abreast of our progress so you know exactly what we are doing and how much it costs. 
 
We know how to work efficiently with as little inconvenience to you as possible while still delivering a final product that surpasses your expectations.
 
We will give you one year warranty on all work and if during a year there's any issue we will fix it in a frame time of 24-72 hours after the first call .
 
Our professionalism, affordability and reliability have helped us build a client base that knows that we do not sacrifice quality for price.  
 
Our Company is committed to working within the budget of your project, ensuring that your renovation is completed on time delivering a high quality result.
 
We are also an Eco-friendly renovations company and we can help you to low your energy costs! 
 
Give us a call..! Our best proof of quality is satisfied customers.

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/GreenMapleHomeRenovations/
